channel.title: Mod problem i realy need help
channel.description: OK im doing boooscape source or poooscape forgot if it was a b or p well...... everyone is a gold mod but thats not the prob.. everyone cant seee their own crown! and i already set everyones rights to 0! and all their stats to 1 but still it keep changing to 99 and 3[br][size=1]Posted at: September 16, 2006, 02:04:35 PM[/size][hr]?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 16, 2006, 02:09:02 PM[/size][hr]???

item.title: Mod problem i realy need help
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

cowie:

hmmmmmmmmmmm…delete ur char files n shit mek a new un specifie it tht way then reload by ur saves and make it a default 0 rights on login in ur client.java :S

In english:
Delete gamesaves and moreinfo files.
Open client.java and find/edit

public boolean ResetPlayerVars() { teleportToX = 0; teleportToY = 0; heightLevel = 0; playerRights = 0; playerIsMember = 1; playerMessages = 0; playerLastConnect = ""; playerLastLogin = 20050101; playerEnergy = 0; playerEnergyGian = 0; playerFollowID = 0; playerGameTime = 0; playerGameCount = 0;
